metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3338 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw null pointer dereference in the Linux kernel DECnet networking protocol was found. A remote user could use this flaw to crash the system.

notes.Note: sbeattie> fix is to remove DECnet support entirely.
